itunes:title: Bret and Heather 34th DarkHorse Podcast Livestream: Portland & Covid: What the Hell?
title: Bret and Heather 34th DarkHorse Podcast Livestream: Portland & Covid: What the Hell?
description:
In this 34th in a series of live discussions with Bret Weinstein and Heather Heying (both PhDs in Biology), we discuss the state of the world though an evolutionary lens. Find more from us on Bret’s website (https://bretweinstein.net) or Heather’s website (http://heatherheying.com). 

 Become a member of the DarkHorse LiveStreams, and get access to an additional Q&A livestream every month. Join at Heather's Patreon. 

 Like this content? Subscribe to the channel, like this video, follow us on twitter (@BretWeinstein, @HeatherEHeying), and consider helping us out by contributing to either of our Patreons or Bret’s Paypal. 

 Looking for clips from #DarkHorseLivestreams? Here are some, updated frequently: @DarkHorse Podcast Clips 

 Theme Music: Thank you to Martin Molin of Wintergatan for providing us the rights to use their excellent music. 

 Q&A Link: https://youtu.be/r13CXPA-x0w 

Support the show
